value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16513v1", "title": "The bracket of the exceptional Lie algebra E8", "summary": "An explicit formula for the bracket of the exceptional simple Lie algebra E8\nbased on triality and oct-octonions is obtained, following the Barton-Sudbery\ndescription of E8.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG,math.GR,math.RA", "published": "2025-04-23T08:39:19Z"}
